detail.author: function Main(html){return jsonPath(html,'$.data.author);}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){var timestamp4 = new Date(jsonPath(html,'$.data.posted_at'));var timestamp4 = timestamp4.toLocaleDateString().replace(///g, '-') + ' ' + timestamp4.toTimeString().substr(0, 8);return timestamp4;}

comic.list: function Main(html){var file=strmiddle(html,'pl = \'','/000');var startid=parseInt(strmiddle(html,'/000','.jpg'));var endid=parseInt(strmiddle(html,'pcount=',';'));var obj= [];for(var i =startid;i<(endid+startid);i++){var num = i;var n=4;var a = (Array(n).join(0) + num).slice(-n);obj.push(file+'/'+a+'.jpg');};return obj;}
